Description:
Responsibilities:Create visually appealing graphics and designs for marketing materials, including social media posts, website banners, brochures, and advertisements
Collaborate with the marketing team to develop design concepts that align with our brand identity and target audience
Produce high-quality design mockups and prototypes for review and approval
Ensure all designs are consistent with our brand guidelines and maintain a cohesive visual identity
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in graphic design
Manage multiple projects and prioritize tasks to meet deadlines
Coordinate with external vendors and printers to ensure accurate and timely production of materials
Provide support for other design-related tasks as needed.The role is for a Retail Store in DeiraSkills
Skills: The ideal candidate will have a strong passion for design and a keen eye for detail. They will be responsible for creating visually appealing graphics and designs for various marketing materials, including digital and print media.

Experience of 1-3 years
Good in photography, video and editing (including Graphic Design)
Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Ability to take constructive feedback and iterate on designs
Knowledge of printing processes and specifications
